tripleplay.util

Interface Destroyable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Instance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Background.Instance, CapturedRoot, Emitter, Glyph, Movie, MoviePlayer, Root, Supplier, Texture

    public interface Destroyable
    A shared interface by all resources that can be destroyed (manually cleaned up).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroys this resource.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys this resource. The resource will no longer be usable after this call.
